name: Robot Gardening
description:
Slip into the casing of PP-420, a Gardening Bot in the year 20XX whose task it is to keep the plants in his care happy. Explore the small greenhouse and enjoy a wholesome atmosphere. Or is there maybe something deeper going on? 

We don't know. After all, it's only a prototype :P

Robot Gardening is a VR Gardening Simulation created by a team of 3 Students during the course of one semester. It's style is loosely inspired by media like Gumball and Wall-E, as well as farming simulations such as Stardew Valley.
